title: ‘Still Room for Improvement’: Pogačar Takes Aim At Cobbled Races and His Missing Monument
content:
Pogačar targets Tour and Worlds defence after ‘perfect season’, decision to race Giro or Vuelta on hold.

Read the full article at ‘Still Room for Improvement’: Pogačar Takes Aim At Cobbled Races and His Missing Monument on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
